Body-Esteem Scale.reasoning: The Body-Esteem Scale is a specific tool used to measure participants' body-esteem levels, making it a clear method of data collection in this study.
passages: Participants included undergraduate women (n = 750) who completed the Body-Esteem Scale (Franzoi & Shields, 1984)
